data.title: Man's Ruin By Schiffmacher 3-piece Giftset - Signed by Henk
data.meta_description: Ever since 1970, we are specialized in knives and tools that make everyday life easier and more fun. Affordable and functional tools for the active outdoorsman, cooking enthusiast, creative spirit, or beauty lover. They are tools for making memories.
data.text:
MAN'S RUIN BY SCHIFFMACHER - SIGNED BY HENK

Man's Ruin - All the weaknesses that can ultimately lead to a man’s demise.

It’s one of the most iconic and timeless tattoos ever – a seductive woman surrounded by bottles of alcohol, playing cards, drugs, and money. All the lusts that are bound to lead men astray in life.

This is a unique set, signed on the box by Henk Schiffmacher himself. A very special gift for yourself or a loved one.

TRY NOT TO GET TEMPTED

The Man’s Ruin gift set consists of a high-end pocket knife, a deck of playing cards, and a golden hip flask.

Complete your Man’s Ruin set with the original Zippo By Schiffmacher lighter.

HIGH-END POCKET KNIFE

This high-end pocket knife is designed by the legend himself. Made of burl wood and high-quality steel with a Corsican-inspired design. And it wouldn’t be a Schiffmacher without his famous Polynesian-styled tattoos. With influences of the Man’s Ruin tattoo and the Niho Mano – shark teeth – pattern.

HAND-DRAWN PLAYING CARDS

Cut the deck with these casino-grade playing cards. All 52 cards are hand-drawn by Schiffmacher – every single one of them. This deck comes in a fancy black and gold-plated box. Spice up your poker nights with these playing cards.

GOLDEN HIP FLASK

This golden hip flask completes the Man’s Ruin giftset as it presents one of the elements of this iconic tattoo. Pick your liquor and fill your 8 oz flask for on the go. The pretty lady on the flask is hand-drawn by Schiffmacher himself. We call her Jade.

HOMEY'S - TOOLS FOR LIFE

Ever since 1970, we are specialized in knives and tools that make everyday life easier and more fun. Affordable and functional tools for the active outdoorsman, cooking enthusiast, creative spirit, or beauty lover. They are tools for making memories.

WARRANTY
